Features Overview ‚Äã

PaperWeight is packed with features designed to seamlessly bridge analog and digital fitness tracking. Here's what makes it special:

ü§ñ AI-Powered Handwriting Recognition ‚Äã

Advanced OCR Technology ‚Äã

  • Smart text recognition that understands fitness terminology
  • Flexible format support - works with your existing log style
  • Exercise mapping - automatically matches written exercises to our database
  • Number parsing - accurately extracts sets, reps, weights, and times
  • Context awareness - understands workout structure and relationships

Supported Formats ‚Äã

The AI can understand various handwriting styles and formats:

‚úÖ Traditional Format:
Squats: 3 sets x 8 reps @ 185 lbs

‚úÖ Shorthand:
SQ: 3x8 @ 185

‚úÖ Set-by-Set:
Set 1: 185 x 8
Set 2: 185 x 8  
Set 3: 185 x 8

‚úÖ Mixed Notes:
Squats felt heavy today
3 sets, 8 reps each, 185 pounds
Good depth on all reps

üìä Comprehensive Analytics ‚Äã

Progress Tracking ‚Äã

  • Volume progression - track total weight moved over time
  • Strength trends - monitor your 1RM estimates and PRs
  • Frequency analysis - see how often you train each muscle group
  • Consistency metrics - maintain your workout streak

Interactive Charts ‚Äã

  • Time series graphs showing strength progression
  • Volume heatmaps displaying training intensity
  • Exercise comparison charts for balanced programming
  • Personal records timeline with automatic detection

Statistical Insights ‚Äã

  • Training volume calculations (sets √ó reps √ó weight)
  • Progressive overload indicators
  • Rest day analysis and recovery tracking
  • Workout duration and efficiency metrics

üîó Strava Integration ‚Äã

Seamless Synchronization ‚Äã

  • Automatic workout matching based on time and duration
  • Heart rate data import from Strava activities
  • Energy expenditure tracking (kilojoules)
  • Activity timeline combining cardio and strength training

Enhanced Data ‚Äã

When connected to Strava, your workouts get enriched with:

  • Heart rate zones during strength training
  • Calories burned calculations
  • Activity photos and social features
  • Complete fitness picture across all activities

Learn more about Strava Integration ‚Üí

üí™ Exercise Database ‚Äã

Comprehensive Library ‚Äã

  • 800+ exercises across all muscle groups
  • Proper form guides and technique tips
  • Muscle group targeting for balanced programming
  • Equipment categorization (bodyweight, barbell, dumbbell, machine)

Smart Exercise Mapping ‚Äã

  • Automatic recognition of exercise variations
  • Alias support - "press" maps to "bench press"
  • Typo tolerance - minor spelling errors are corrected
  • Custom exercises - add your own unique movements

Exercise Analytics ‚Äã

  • Personal records tracking for each exercise
  • Volume progression per exercise
  • Frequency analysis - how often you perform each movement
  • Form notes and technique reminders

üì± Mobile-Optimized Design ‚Äã

Responsive Interface ‚Äã

  • Mobile-first design optimized for phone use
  • Quick photo capture with camera integration
  • Swipe gestures for efficient navigation
  • Offline support for viewing historical data

Camera Features ‚Äã

  • Auto-focus and lighting adjustment
  • Crop guides for optimal photo framing
  • Multiple format support (portrait/landscape)
  • Batch upload for multiple workout pages

üîê Privacy & Security ‚Äã

Data Ownership ‚Äã

  • Your data belongs to you - export anytime
  • Secure cloud storage with automatic backups
  • Privacy-focused - no data selling or advertising
  • GDPR compliant data handling

Authentication ‚Äã

  • Secure signup/login with email verification
  • Password security with modern encryption
  • Session management across devices
  • Account recovery options

üìà Workout Management ‚Äã

Flexible Organization ‚Äã

  • Custom workout naming and categorization
  • Date range filtering for specific time periods
  • Search functionality across all workouts
  • Bulk operations for data management

Editing Capabilities ‚Äã

  • Post-upload editing of all workout data
  • Exercise substitution and corrections
  • Note additions for context and memories
  • Set modifications (reps, weight, RPE)

Templates & Planning ‚Äã

  • Workout templates from previous sessions
  • Exercise suggestions based on history
  • Program tracking for structured training plans
  • Goal setting and milestone tracking

üéØ User Experience ‚Äã

Intuitive Navigation ‚Äã

  • Bottom navigation for core features
  • Contextual actions where you need them
  • Visual feedback for all interactions
  • Helpful tooltips and guidance

Customization ‚Äã

  • Theme options matching your style
  • Unit preferences (lbs/kg, metric/imperial)
  • Display settings for charts and data views
  • Notification preferences for reminders

What's Coming Next? ‚Äã

We're constantly improving PaperWeight based on user feedback:

  • Social features for training communities
  • Advanced analytics with machine learning insights
  • Wearable integration beyond Strava
  • Nutrition tracking integration
  • Coach/trainer features for professionals
